text: Kirshnik Khari Ball (June 18, 1994 - November 1, 2022), known professionally as Takeoff, was an American rapper and songwriter. He formed the hip hop and trap group Migos in Atlanta, Georgia. The group later split in 2022, before Takeoff's death. Takeoff released his solo album The Last Rocket in 2018. He also received two Grammy Award nominations. == Assassination == Ball was assassinated by shooting outside of a bowling alley perpetrated by three unidentified minors in Houston, Texas on 1 November 2022. He was 28 years old.US rapper Takeoff, 28, shot dead in Houston, Texas On December 2, Patrick Xavier Clark was arrested in connection with the murder. A grand jury would indict Clark for the murder on May 26, 2023. == Albums == * The Last Rocket (2018) == References == Category:1994 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Rappers from Georgia (U.S. state) Category:21st-century American rappers Category:American trap musicians Category:Deaths by firearm in Texas Category:American songwriters
title: Takeoff (rapper)
